INT atoms_per_scanline = DDrvGetScanlineInc(glyph.GetWidth())
 

UINT16 col_val = (UINT16)m_color_value
 

Implementation note:

Assuming that lower case characters have around 40 % of empty data, the penalty for asking (*src_data != 0) should be compensated. For chinese characters this leads to a slight performance decreasement...
